description:
This course will get you up and running with one of the most popular video editing applications today: Adobe Premiere Pro.

Premiere Pro has become the industry-leading editing software for filmmakers, television broadcasters, journalists, students, and videographers.

In this course we will go through an overview of Adobe Premiere Pro CC. I'll give a guided tour of the interface and the many tools within the program to edit video and audio in the creation of a final presentation.

You will learn how to import files, all the editing essentials like how to make cuts, the basics of editing, video and audio effects. You will also learn about titles, editing video from multiple camera sources, exporting projects to various media and more!

By the end of this course you will have a solid familiarity with many of the tools in Premiere Pro so that you can begin creating your own polished and professional video presentations.
title: Adobe Premiere Pro Video Editing Essentials
